verses.verse: And these are the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H261>Ehud<s%>: these are the <S%H7218>heads<s%> of <S%H1>fathers<s%>' houses of the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H1387>Geba<s%>, and they <S%H1540>carried<s%> them captive to <S%H4506>Manahath<s%>:
and <S%H5283>Naaman<s%>, and <S%H281>Ahijah<s%>, and <S%H1617>Gera<s%>, he <S%H1540>carried<s%> them <S%H3205>captive<s%>: and he begat <S%H5798>Uzza<s%> and <S%H284>Ahihud<s%>.

And <S%H7842>Shaharaim<s%> <S%H3205>begat<s%> children in the field of <S%H4124>Moab<s%>, <S%H4480>after<s%> he had sent them <S%H7971>away<s%>; <S%H2366>Hushim<s%> and <S%H1199>Baara<s%> were his <S%H802>wives<s%>.
And he <S%H3205>begat<s%> of <S%H2321>Hodesh<s%> his <S%H802>wife<s%>, <S%H3103>Jobab<s%>, and <S%H6644>Zibia<s%>, and <S%H4331>Mesha<s%>, and <S%H4445>Malcam<s%>,
and <S%H3263>Jeuz<s%>, and <S%H7634>Shachia<s%>, and <S%H4821>Mirmah<s%>. These were his <S%H1121>sons<s%>, <S%H7218>heads<s%> of <S%H1>fathers<s%>' houses.

And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H508>Elpaal<s%>: <S%H5677>Eber<s%>, and <S%H4936>Misham<s%>, and <S%H8106>Shemed<s%>, who <S%H1129>built<s%> <S%H207>Ono<s%> and <S%H3850>Lod<s%>, with the towns <S%H1323>thereof<s%>;

and <S%H1283>Beriah<s%>, and <S%H8087>Shema<s%>, <S%H1992>who<s%> were <S%H7218>heads<s%> of <S%H1>fathers<s%>' houses of the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H357>Aijalon<s%>, who put to <S%H1272>flight<s%> the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H1661>Gath<s%>;
These were <S%H7218>heads<s%> of <S%H1>fathers<s%>' houses throughout their <S%H8435>generations<s%>, <S%H7218>chief<s%> <S%H3427>men<s%>: these dwelt in <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>.
And in <S%H1391>Gibeon<s%> there <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> the <S%H1>father<s%> of <S%H1391>Gibeon<s%>, <S%H802>Jeiel<s%>, whose wife's <S%H8034>name<s%> was <S%H4601>Maacah<s%>;
and his <S%H1060>first-born<s%> <S%H1121>son<s%> <S%H5658>Abdon<s%>, and <S%H6698>Zur<s%>, and <S%H7027>Kish<s%>, and <S%H1168>Baal<s%>, and <S%H5070>Nadab<s%>,

And <S%H4732>Mikloth<s%> <S%H3205>begat<s%> <S%H8039>Shimeah<s%>. And they <S%H637>also<s%> <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> with their <S%H251>brethren<s%> in <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>, over against their <S%H5048>brethren<s%>.

And <S%H5369>Ner<s%> <S%H3205>begat<s%> <S%H7027>Kish<s%>; and <S%H7027>Kish<s%> <S%H3205>begat<s%> <S%H7586>Saul<s%>; and <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H3205>begat<s%> <S%H3083>Jonathan<s%>, and <S%H4444>Malchi-shua<s%>, and <S%H41>Abinadab<s%>, and <S%H792>Eshbaal<s%>.
And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H4318>Micah<s%>: <S%H6377>Pithon<s%>, and <S%H4429>Melech<s%>, and <S%H8390>Tarea<s%>, and <S%H271>Ahaz<s%>.

And <S%H682>Azel<s%> had <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%>, whose <S%H8034>names<s%> are <S%H5840>these<s%>: Azrikam, <S%H1074>Bocheru<s%>, and <S%H3458>Ishmael<s%>, and <S%H8187>Sheariah<s%>, and <S%H5662>Obadiah<s%>, and <S%H2605>Hanan<s%>. All these were the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H682>Azel<s%>.

And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H6232>Eshek<s%> his <S%H251>brother<s%>: <S%H198>Ulam<s%> his <S%H1060>first-born<s%>, <S%H3266>Jeush<s%> the <S%H8145>second<s%>, and <S%H467>Eliphelet<s%> the <S%H7992>third<s%>.

And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H198>Ulam<s%> were <S%H1368>mighty<s%> <S%H582>men<s%> of <S%H2428>valor<s%>, <S%H1869>archers<s%>, and had <S%H7235>many<s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%>, and <S%H1121>sons<s%>' <S%H1121>sons<s%>, a <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H2572>fifty<s%>. All these were of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%>.
